alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Grady (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 8:26PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Gadsden, north central Leon, southeastern Decatur and southwestern Grady Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 826 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Havana, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Havana, Tallahassee, Attapulgus, Freemont, Darsey, Lake Iamonia, Concord, Jamieson, Rocky Hill, Laingkat, Calvary, Reno, Fowlstown, Princes Still, Amsterdam, Branchville, Nickleville, Hinson, Dogtown and Orchard Pond. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
